title: Animated Widget Contact Pro v2.0.1 [Android]--[ { ( nnas ) } ]--
description:

[center][font="Comic Sans MS"][color=black][b]Animated Widget Contact Pro v2.0.1 [Android]--[ { ( nnas ) } ]--[RTRG][/b][/color][/font][/center]



[center][img]http://s20.postimg.org/6tnixe0zh/image.png[/img][/center]

[color=green][b]Description[/b][/color]

[color=red][b]Bundle of Contact, Contact Group, Apps Launcher Widgets.

Contact, Group Contact widgets shows photo of the contact(s), have quick dial, SMS, chat and email options.

App Launcer widget shows selected by you apps at one icon, so you can group your apps for example: Games, Office, etc.

PRO version has no limitations on widgets count.

Animated fast dial widget greatly facilitates such tasks as dialing frequent or favorite contacts, sending SMS, MMS or e-mailing. Call your contacts in 1-2 taps

Favorite apps launcher. You can add some frequently used apps to group widget and start those apps in 2 clicks. You can Save space on your home screen. Group items according to labels and create fully customizable folders and widgets. You can organize your apps.

Do you need new features in Animaged Widget? Please suggest / vote for new features here: <a href="
http://www.google.com/moderator/#16/e=21622b[/b][/color]" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.google.com/moderator/#16/e=21622b[/b][/color]</a>

[color=green][b]What's New[/b][/color]

[color=red][b]2.0.1:
- fixed problem with custom images
- fixed problem with empty list in group contact selector: currently applied filters are visible now and could be removed by single tap
- fixed several bugs in bookmarks launcher
- effect of moving shorcuts was returned
- Facebook selector was completely changed because of recent changes in Facebook API
- minor improvements and bug fixes[/b][/color]


[color=Red][b]Respects To[/b][/color] : [color=green][b]SaM,oziman,taker and all Admins of ET[/b][/color]
